text: ayina i manavulalo kondaru itarulanu, allah ku sati kalpincukuni, allah nu premincavalasina vidhanga varini premistaru. Kani visvasulu andarikante atyadhikanga allah ne premistaru. Mariyu i durmargam cestunna varu pratyaksanga cudagaligite! A siksanu cusinappudu, varu niscayanga, sarvasakti kevalam allah ke cendutundi mariyu niscayanga, allah cala kathinanga siksincevadu, (ani telusukune varu)
